name: Lost and Lose
description:
Control：

WASD to Move

We try to make a game that gives you a chance to restart your journey while carrying all of your experience. 

Think about your life as this maze. This time, what would you do to reach the final. Use the shortcut? Gain as many as possible? Somewhere in between? What if there is an entirely different side of world that you’ve never thought about it…
